birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市

description.zh-cn: 香港导演、监制、编剧，以文艺爱情片见长，多次夺得香港电影金像奖并四度角逐坎城影展金棕榈奖，是首位拿下坎城影展最佳导演奖的华人导演。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director, producer, and screenwriter, known for his art-house romance films. He is a multiple Hong Kong Film Award winner, a four-time Palme d'Or nominee at the Cannes Film Festival, and the first Chinese director to win the Best Director Award at Cannes.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，王家卫的出生地。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China and the birthplace of Wong Kar-wai.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的公立研究型大学，王家卫曾在此就读平面设计专业但未毕业。
description.en: A public research university located in Hong Kong, where Wong Kar-wai studied graphic design but did not graduate.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的公立大学，曾授予王家卫荣誉社会科学博士学位。
description.en: A public university in Hong Kong that awarded Wong Kar-wai an honorary Doctor of Social Science.

description.zh-cn: 美国私立研究型大学，曾授予王家卫艺术荣誉博士学位。
description.en: A private research university in the United States that awarded Wong Kar-wai an honorary Doctor of Arts.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫曾就读的香港中学。
description.en: A secondary school in Hong Kong that Wong Kar-wai attended.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫的妻子、制片人和出品人。曾任电视广播有限公司节目监制，被王家卫称为其“缪斯女神”。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai's wife, producer, and presenter. She was a former program producer at TVB and is described by Wong Kar-wai as his 'muse'.

description.zh-cn: 香港媒体人，曾任香港无线电视节目部经理，是王家卫的恩师。
description.en: A Hong Kong media personality and former manager of the programming department at TVB, considered a mentor by Wong Kar-wai.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费无线电视台。王家卫于1980年进入其导演训练班，并曾任制作助理。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong. Wong Kar-wai joined its director training program in 1980 and later worked as a production assistant.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、制片人及导演，曾资助王家卫开拍其首部电影《旺角卡门》及《阿飞正传》。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor, producer, and director who financed Wong Kar-wai's debut film 'As Tears Go By' and 'Days of Being Wild'.

description.zh-cn: 1988年上映的香港电影，是王家卫执导的第一部电影。
description.en: A 1988 Hong Kong film, the directorial debut of Wong Kar-wai.

description.zh-cn: 1990年上映的香港电影，王家卫凭此片首次获得香港电影金像奖及金马奖最佳导演。
description.en: A 1990 Hong Kong film for which Wong Kar-wai won his first Best Director awards at the Hong Kong Film Awards and the Golden Horse Awards.

description.zh-cn: 香港导演、编剧，与王家卫合伙开设泽东电影公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong director and screenwriter who co-founded Jet Tone Films with Wong Kar-wai.

description.zh-cn: 由王家卫和刘镇伟合伙开设的电影制作公司。
description.en: A film production company co-founded by Wong Kar-wai and Jeffrey Lau.

description.zh-cn: 1997年举办的电影节，王家卫凭《春光乍泄》获最佳导演奖。
description.en: The 1997 edition of the film festival where Wong Kar-wai won the Best Director Award for 'Happy Together'.

description.zh-cn: 1997年上映的香港电影，为王家卫赢得第50届坎城影展最佳导演奖。
description.en: A 1997 Hong Kong film that earned Wong Kar-wai the Best Director Award at the 50th Cannes Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 2006年举办的电影节，王家卫担任该届评审团主席。
description.en: The 2006 edition of the film festival where Wong Kar-wai served as the President of the Jury.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚裔香港电影摄影师，与王家卫、张叔平并称“铁三角”，长期合作。
description.en: An Australian-Hong Kong cinematographer, known for his long-term collaboration with Wong Kar-wai and William Chang, forming the 'iron triangle'.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影美术指导及服装设计师，与王家卫、杜可风并称“铁三角”，长期合作。
description.en: A Hong Kong art director and costume designer, known for his long-term collaboration with Wong Kar-wai and Christopher Doyle, forming the 'iron triangle'.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，多次与王家卫合作，并表示拍其电影后演技进步。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor who has frequently collaborated with Wong Kar-wai and stated that his acting improved after working on his films.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，多次与王家卫合作，并表示拍其电影后演技进步。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress who has frequently collaborated with Wong Kar-wai and stated that her acting improved after working on his films.

description.zh-cn: 中国演员，曾与王家卫合作，并表示拍其电影后演技进步。
description.en: A Chinese actress who has collaborated with Wong Kar-wai and stated that her acting improved after working on his films.

description.zh-cn: 《繁花》电视剧编剧，指控王家卫侵犯其著作权。
description.en: Screenwriter for the TV series 'Blossoms Shanghai' who accused Wong Kar-wai of copyright infringement.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫执导的电视剧，于2023年播出。该剧引发了与编剧程骏年的署名权争议。
description.en: A television series directed by Wong Kar-wai, broadcast in 2023. The series led to a copyright dispute with screenwriter Cheng Junnian.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。据一段录音披露，王家卫和李爽曾对其处理武汉疫情的方式提出批评。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China. According to a recording, Wong Kar-wai and Li Shuang criticized its handling of the Wuhan epidemic.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2019冠状病毒病疫情期间采取的一系列严厉防疫政策。据披露的录音，王家卫对此政策持批评态度。
description.en: A series of strict epidemic prevention and control measures adopted by the Communist Party of China during the COVID-19 pandemic. According to a leaked recording, Wong Kar-wai was critical of this policy.

description.zh-cn: 《繁花》电视剧的联合导演。在一段录音中，她和王家卫等人一同批评了中国共产党的政策。
description.en: Co-director of the TV series 'Blossoms Shanghai'. In a recording, she, along with Wong Kar-wai and others, criticized the policies of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 《繁花》电视剧的制作人。一段录音显示她参与了王家卫和李爽关于中国政治的讨论。
description.en: Producer of the TV series 'Blossoms Shanghai'. A recording indicated her participation in a discussion with Wong Kar-wai and Li Shuang about Chinese politics.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西共和国的政府，曾授予王家卫法国荣誉军团勋章。
description.en: The government of the French Republic, which awarded Wong Kar-wai the Legion of Honour.

description.zh-cn: 法国政府部门，曾授予王家卫法兰西艺术与文学勋章司令勋章。
description.en: A ministry of the French government that awarded Wong Kar-wai the Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫于1958年7月17日出生于中国上海。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai was born in Shanghai, China on July 17, 1958.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫于1976年毕业于格致书院中五年级。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai graduated from Form 5 of Kachai College in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫曾就读于香港理工学院美术设计系两年，但未毕业。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai studied in the Graphic Design department at the Hong Kong Polytechnic for two years but did not graduate.

description.zh-cn: 2007年11月，王家卫获香港公开大学颁授荣誉社会科学博士学位。
description.en: In November 2007, Wong Kar-wai was awarded an honorary Doctor of Social Science by the Hong Kong Metropolitan University.

description.zh-cn: 2018年5月，王家卫获哈佛大学授予艺术荣誉博士学位。
description.en: In May 2018, Wong Kar-wai was awarded an honorary Doctor of Arts by Harvard University.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫和陈以靳于1985年在香港结婚。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai and Esther Chan married in Hong Kong in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 陈以靳在邂逅王家卫后，建议他报名参加TVB的导演培训班。
description.en: After meeting Wong Kar-wai, Esther Chan suggested he enroll in TVB's director training program.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫称妻子陈以靳为其“缪斯女神”，其电影中极具魅力的女性角色都有她的影子。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai calls his wife Esther Chan his 'muse,' stating that the charismatic female characters in his films are all inspired by her.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫于1980年进入电视广播有限公司导演训练班，后任制作助理，于1981年离开。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai joined the director training program at TVB in 1980, later worked as a production assistant, and left in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 在无线电视任职期间，王家卫受到时任节目部经理甘国亮的垂青，获得了大量戏剧创作机会。
description.en: During his time at TVB, Wong Kar-wai was highly regarded by then-program manager Kam Kwok-leung, which gave him numerous opportunities for dramatic creation.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫视甘国亮为恩师。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai regards Kam Kwok-leung as his mentor.

description.zh-cn: 邓光荣发现了王家卫的才华，并资助他开拍了首部电影《旺角卡门》和后续的《阿飞正传》。
description.en: Alan Tang discovered Wong Kar-wai's talent and financed his debut film 'As Tears Go By' and the subsequent 'Days of Being Wild'.

description.zh-cn: 邓光荣资助王家卫开拍电影《旺角卡门》。
description.en: Alan Tang financed Wong Kar-wai's film 'As Tears Go By'.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫与好友刘镇伟合伙开设了泽东电影公司。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai co-founded Jet Tone Films with his friend Jeffrey Lau.

description.zh-cn: 刘镇伟与好友王家卫合伙开设了泽东电影公司。
description.en: Jeffrey Lau co-founded Jet Tone Films with his friend Wong Kar-wai.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年第50届坎城影展上，王家卫凭借电影《春光乍泄》获得最佳导演奖。
description.en: At the 50th Cannes Film Festival in 1997, Wong Kar-wai won the Best Director Award for the film 'Happy Together'.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫获邀担任2006年第59届康城影展的评审团主席。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai was invited to be the President of the Jury for the 59th Cannes Film Festival in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫常与摄影师杜可风、美术指导张叔平合作，被外界称为“铁三角”。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai often collaborates with cinematographer Christopher Doyle and art director William Chang, and they are known as the 'iron triangle'.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫常与摄影师杜可风、美术指导张叔平合作，被外界称为“铁三角”。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai often collaborates with cinematographer Christopher Doyle and art director William Chang, and they are known as the 'iron triangle'.

description.zh-cn: 演员梁朝伟表示，拍过王家卫的电影后演技进步。
description.en: Actor Tony Leung Chiu-wai stated that his acting improved after working on Wong Kar-wai's films.

description.zh-cn: 演员张曼玉表示，拍过王家卫的电影后演技进步。
description.en: Actress Maggie Cheung stated that her acting improved after working on Wong Kar-wai's films.

description.zh-cn: 演员章子怡表示，拍过王家卫的电影后演技进步。
description.en: Actress Zhang Ziyi stated that her acting improved after working on Wong Kar-wai's films.

description.zh-cn: 《繁花》编剧程骏年指控王家卫侵犯其关于该剧的著作权。
description.en: Cheng Junnian, screenwriter for 'Blossoms Shanghai', accused Wong Kar-wai of infringing his copyright for the series.

description.zh-cn: 在程骏年发布的录音中，王家卫批评中国共产党处理武汉疫情的方式，并称其为“贪婪的一党制国家”。
description.en: In a recording released by Cheng Junnian, Wong Kar-wai criticized the Communist Party of China's handling of the Wuhan epidemic and referred to it as a 'greedy one-party state'.

description.zh-cn: 在程骏年发布的录音中，王家卫对中国共产党在武汉疫情期间采取的严厉防疫措施表示了批评。
description.en: In a recording released by Cheng Junnian, Wong Kar-wai expressed criticism of the strict anti-epidemic measures taken by the Communist Party of China during the Wuhan epidemic.

description.zh-cn: 在程骏年发布的录音中，《繁花》联合导演李爽提到“共产党不讲情”。
description.en: In a recording released by Cheng Junnian, 'Blossoms Shanghai' co-director Li Shuang mentioned that 'the Communist Party does not talk about sentiment'.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫与《繁花》联合导演李爽在一段录音中一同讨论中国政治。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai and 'Blossoms Shanghai' co-director Li Shuang were recorded discussing Chinese politics together.

description.zh-cn: 王家卫与《繁花》制作人彭绮华在一段录音中一同讨论中国政治。
description.en: Wong Kar-wai and 'Blossoms Shanghai' producer Jacky Pang were recorded discussing Chinese politics together.

description.zh-cn: 2006年5月21日，法国政府授予王家卫荣誉军团骑士级勋章，以表彰其对电影业的贡献。
description.en: On May 21, 2006, the French government awarded Wong Kar-wai the Knight of the Legion of Honour in recognition of his contributions to the film industry.

description.zh-cn: 2013年，法国文化及通信部授予王家卫法兰西艺术与文学勋章中最高等级的“司令勋章”。
description.en: In 2013, the French Ministry of Culture and Communication awarded Wong Kar-wai the Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres, its highest rank.
